attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Autocar, in collaboration with Capoco Design, has redesigned London's Routeoligarch bus for the 21st century. The story's been picked up by much of the national and international media - the BBC, The Times, The Evening Standard and MSN News have all run it.
It is ONE of the London icons.
An up to date routeoligarch could be ecological way to make profit bringing foreign tourist.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
